This project implements the Command Line Interface like UNIX-shell

This project includes the following commands:

Directory commands:

1.ls (with support for -R)
2.pwd
3.mkdir
4.rmdir
5.cd

File Commands:

1.grep
2.find
3.cat
4.cp
5.mv
6.rm (with support for -r)
7.sizeof
8.head
9.tail

Miscellaneous commands:

1.date
2.whoami
3.hostname
4.timeit
5.exit
6.history
